item.title: C v/s C++
item.description: 1. File Extension: C - Files are saved with .c extension. C++ - Files are saved with .cpp extension. 2. Area of usage: C - Embedded devices And system-level code. C++ - Gaming,networking and server-side applications. 3. Compatibility: C - The C compiler isnâ€™t able to execute the C++ code. C++ - C++ is a superset of C so C++ is able to run most C code.
